OOC Now, before anyone hurts me, I have some apologies and 
explanations. 

I've been absent because of two things, and will be doing the best I 
can to catch up immediately.

First of all, a suckerpunching lil cheap-shot pussy-ass bitch jumped 
into a scrap I was involved in with someone else completely. 
Subsequently, after he hit me from behind (he wasn't even involved) 
four times, I lost four teeth. He ran away like a scared little girl 
right after and I've been involved in major dental work and morphine.
Secondly, my ISP deleted my account. They thought they just cancelled 
service by accident, and it took them a week or so to figure it all 
out.

Anyway, I hope you can understand that this was beyond my control, 
and so I will try my best to work back into the storyline with a few 
cumulative posts today or tomorrow.

Thanks,
Daniel
